content_to_avoid.Description: Content promoting child-free lifestyles or framing children as burdens
Material promoting destructive behaviors or undermining traditional ethical frameworks
Material that includes strong profanity or offensive language not suitable for children.
Material that includes overt sexual themes, immodesty, or explicit imagery not suitable for children.
Content that portrays graphic violence, disturbing imagery, or excessive harm to individuals.
Content promoting radical political, social, or gender ideologies that are inappropriate for young viewers.
Videos that encourage dangerous, reckless activities or harmful behavior that children may imitate.

recommendations: animated shows that teach good values
superhero shows that promote bravery and kindness
classic superhero cartoons with no agenda
